enrichment: Email validation: RFC 5322 compliant regex, max 254 chars
Password rules: min 8 chars, at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 digit, 1 special
Task title: required, min 1 char, max 255 chars, trim whitespace
Task description: optional, max 2000 chars, allow Unicode
JWT access token TTL: 15 minutes, refresh token TTL: 7 days
Database: tasks table with id (UUID4), user_id (FK), title, description, status, created_at, updated_at
Pagination: default page=1, limit=20, max limit=100
Rate limits: 5 auth attempts/min/IP, 100 API calls/min/user
assumptions: SQLite file will be created automatically in project root
JWT secret key will be provided via environment variable
Frontend will be served from same origin as API in production
No soft delete; DELETE is permanent
